populate.description: Fields to populate, seperated by commas, for example: `owner,workspace`

raw.description: Disable the default `{$set: body}` of "update" query & update `{body}` directly to the items

search.description: Mark this request as search (return the similar results based on the filter query params)

download.description: If `true`, return the excel binary file to download.

repoSSH.description:
`REQUIRES`
---
A SSH URI of the source code repository

repoURL.description:
OPTIONAL
---
A SSH URI of the source code repository

consumer_key.description:
The CONSUMER_KEY for Bitbucket authentication:
to create new repo, commit, pull & push changes to the repositories.

consumer_secret.description:
The CONSUMER_SECRET for Bitbucket authentication:
to create new repo, commit, pull & push changes to the repositories.

app_password.description:
The APP_PASSWORD for Bitbucket authentication:
to create new repo, commit, pull & push changes to the repositories.

verified.description: `TRUE` if the REST API calling was successfully.

client_id.description:
The app's CLIENT_ID for Github authentication:
to create new repo, commit, pull & push changes to the repositories.

client_secret.description:
The app's CLIENT_SECRET for Github authentication:
to create new repo, commit, pull & push changes to the repositories.

personal_access_token.description:
The PERSONAL ACCESS TOKEN for Github authentication:
to create new repo, commit, pull & push changes to the repositories.

verified.description: `TRUE` if the REST API calling was successfully.

type.description:
One of:
- undefined | "custom": custom role
- "admin": default super admin role
- "member": default member role
- "moderator": default moderator role

slug.description: Workspace slug: auto-generated by "name" column

public.description: Is this a `public` workspace that anyone can join, otherwise it's a `private` workspace that needs approval on joining request.

username.description:
Unique username of a user
This equavilent with "slug"

verified.description: Is this user's email or phone verified?

providers.description: List of Cloud Providers which this user can access to

ObjectId.description: A class representation of the BSON ObjectId type.

DeployEnvironment.description: A deployment's environment of the application.

imageURL.description:
Image URI of this app on the Container Registry.
- Combined from: `<registry-image-base-url>/<project-slug>/<app-name-slug>`
- If you build from the source code, don't specify `tag` at the end! (eg. `latest`, `beta`,...)

shouldInherit.description: Set to `false` if you DON'T want to inherit the Ingress YAML config from the previous deployment

redirect.description: Set to `false` if you don't want to redirect all the secondary domains to the primary domain.

basePath.description: Application base path in the endpoint URL

cdn.description: Flag to enable CDN for this application

tlsSecret.description:
Secret name to hold the key of SSL, will be automatically generated.
Only need to specify when using "custom" SSL (which is the SSL from third-party issuer)

buildNumber.description: Build number is image's tag (no special characters, eg. "dot" or "comma")

prereleaseDeploymentYaml.description: Content of prerelease deployment YAML file

createdBy.description: User name of the first person who deploy on this environment.

lastUpdatedBy.description: User name of the last person who deploy or update this environment.

IApp.description: An interface that extends IBase and describes the properties of an app.

OPTIONAL: The image URI of this app on the Container Registry (without `TAG`).

**Don't** specify `tag` at the end! (e.g., `latest`, `beta`,...)

imageURL.description:
`REQUIRES`
---

- Combined from: `<registry-image-base-url>/<project-slug>/<app-name-slug>`

OPTIONAL
---
Destination namespace name, will be generated automatically by `<project-slug>-<env>` if not specified.

OPTIONAL
---
Set to `false` if you DON'T want to inherit the Ingress YAML config from the previous deployment

OPTIONAL
---

---

- `custom`

slug.description: App slug

envVars.description: Array of variables to be created on deploy environment in JSON format

slug.description: Slug of an item, generated automatically by its "name"

host.description: The host (domain) of your container registry which you are using.

organization.description: Organization name in Docker Registry, or Project ID in Google/DigitalOcean Container Registry.

imageBaseURL.description:
Base URL of the image, usually is the registry host URI combines with something else.
- This will be used to combine with your project/app image path.

serviceAccount.description:
Content of the Service Account credentials ti access services on this cloud provider
- Apply for: Google Cloud, AWS,...
- For example: Kubernetes Clusters, Single Sign-On,...

apiAccessToken.description:
Content of the API access token to use services on this cloud provider
- Apply for: Digital Ocean

slug.description: Slug of an item, generated automatically by its "name"

env.description:
Build for which deploy environment
- **[OPTIONAL] DO NOT rely on this!**
- A build should be able to be used for any deploy environments.

Pick_IBuild.Exclude_keyofIBuild.keyofHid.description: From T, pick a set of properties whose keys are in the union K

Omit_IBuild.keyofHiddenBodyKeys_.description: Construct a type with the properties of T except for those in type K.

cliVersion.description: Diginext CLI version of client user

buildWatch.description: Enable async to watch the build process

buildDir.description:
Path to the source code directory
* [OPTIONAL] Only apply for CLI command, has no effects on API call

env.description:
Select the deploy environment to build image, in this case, this info is using for selecting "Dockerfile"
of specific deploy environment only, for example: "Dockerfile.dev" or "Dockerfile.prod",
if you don't specify "env", a default "Dockerfile" will be selected.
- **[OPTIONAL] SHOULD NOT rely on this!**
- A build should be able to used for any deploy environments.

user.description:
{User} instance of the author
- `If passing "user", no need to pass "userId" and vice versa.`

userId.description:
ID of the author
- `If passing "userId", no need to pass "user" and vice versa.`

gitBranch.description: Select a git branch to pull source code & build

buildNumber.description: Build number is also an container image's tag

slug.description: Slug of an item, generated automatically by its "name"

shortName.description: Cloud provider short name, without spacing & special characters

apiAccessToken.description:
Content of the API access token to use services on this cloud provider
- Apply for: Digital Ocean

serviceAccount.description:
Content of the Service Account credentials ti access services on this cloud provider
- Apply for: Google Cloud, AWS,...
- For example: Kubernetes Clusters, Single Sign-On,...

clusters.description: List of available clusters on this provider

shortName.description: A cluster name on the cloud provider, **NOT** a cluster name in `kubeconfig`

contextName.description: Cluster context name (to access via `kubectl context`)

providerShortName.description: Short name of the cloud provider

projectID.description: [GOOGLE ONLY] Project ID of this cluster

The PRIMARY domain of this cluster

region.description: [GOOGLE CLOUD] Specify a region of your cluster

zone.description: [GOOGLE CLOUD] Specify a zone of your cluster

cluster.description: Cluster's short name. For deploy to specific cluster.

isPublic.description: Git repository access policy, default is PRIVATE.

projectId.description:
ID of the {Project}
- [WARN] This is NOT a {PROJECT_ID} of Google Cloud platform!

deployYaml.description: Content of the deployment yaml (Namespace, Ingress, Service, Deploy,...)

shouldUseFreshDeploy.description:
! Should deploy app from a fresh namespace
## [WARNING]
- **With this flag enabled, the server will wipe out all current deployments within the target namespace, then deploy your app completely from scratch!**
- Use at your own risk, make sure you understand what you're doing, double check the namespace before deploying to avoid accidently take down other apps.

shouldEnableCDN.description: [Use when deploying an app] Should enable CDN for this app

shouldUploadDotenv.description: [Use when deploying an app] Force upload local DOTENV file to deployed environment.

shouldInstallPackage.description: Should install NPM packages locally after creating new project

shouldUpdateCli.description: Should update CLI version before running the command

shouldShowInputOptions.default:
false
Should show input options while executing the command [for DEBUGGING]

skipCreatingDirectory.description: Should skip creating new directory while creating project

env.description:
Specify environment code:
- One of: `dev, prod, staging,...`

targetDirectory.description: Location where the CLI command point to.

slug.description: {App} slug

org.description:
User input organization
- Use when container registry authentication

isLocal.description: Define if the command was executed on local machine or server machine

tail.description: Print the logs and keep watching until the end

isTail.description: Follow the output logs until the command is finished.

InputOptions.description: Các giá trị đầu vào của CLI

skipReadyCheck.description:
### WARNING
Skip checking deployed POD's ready status.
- The response status will always be SUCCESS even if the pod is unable to start up properly.

forceRollOut.description:
### FOR DEPLOY to PROD
Force roll out the release to "prod" deploy environment (instead of "prerelease" environment)

shouldUseFreshDeploy.description:
[DANGER]
---
Should delete old deployment and deploy a new one from scratch

omitBackground.description: Hides default white background and allows generating pdfs with transparency.

hasTouch.description: Specify if the viewport supports touch events.

isLandscape.description: Specifies if the viewport is in landscape mode.

isMobile.description: Whether the `meta viewport` tag is taken into account.

deviceScaleFactor.description:
Specify device scale factor.
See {@link https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Window/devicePixelRatio | devicePixelRatio} for more info.

fromSurface.description: Capture the screenshot from the surface, rather than the view.

captureBeyondViewport.description: Capture the screenshot beyond the viewport.

omitBackground.description: Hides default white background and allows capturing screenshots with transparency.

quality.description: Quality of the image, between 0-100. Not applicable to `png` images.

clip.description: An object which specifies the clipping region of the page.

fullPage.description: When `true`, takes a screenshot of the full page.

path.description:
The file path to save the image to. The screenshot type will be inferred
from file extension. If path is a relative path, then it is resolved
relative to current working directory. If no path is provided, the image
won't be saved to the disk.
